divs: sighting detailswent on my balcony to have a smoke, saw this coming from the east going straight west, triangular form with peripheral lights, saw it pass by earlier this year during full moon, just beneath cloud level, could see it was brass\copper colored with angular black line covering a convoy of 8 to 10 of these flying in formation same path same eight and same heading.
